ygData.subject: RE: BQ (Bards Quarterly) A few words about bards and fa shion (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes, my Bard is a half-elf. I/we may dislike the way the banded helm looks, but it sure looks better than the leather one did. I ve pretty much started
ygData.messageBody:
> you must be a half elf, I HATE that. I spent
> alot of time getting the Blackened Iron Crown,
> only to find out that it looked the SAME, just
> a little different color trim. ARGGGHHHH

Yes, my Bard is a half-elf. I/we may dislike the way the banded helm looks,
but it sure looks better than the leather one did. I've pretty much started
considering just not wearing one because I like the way my character looks
without anything on his head.

It would be neat if you could buy/wear the pointy type hats for wizards
don't you think? My wizard would be all over that.. hehe
